description.value: Character can subtract their Willpower Bonus from the number of Degrees of Failiure they suffer on any failed Fear Test. If this reduces the number to 0 or less, they count as passing the Fear Test with 1 degree of success.

system.benefit: Character can subtract their Willpower Bonus from the number of Degrees of Failiure they suffer on any failed Fear Test. If this reduces the number to 0 or less, they count as passing the Fear Test with 1 degree of success.

specialAbilities.name: Adamantium Faith
specialAbilities.description: You can subtract your Willpower Bonus from the Degrees of Failure you suffer on failed Fear and Pinning tests.
